studio.myBusinessDescription: Manage your team's digital business cards and permissions
studio.homeDescription: Customize your main profile card with name, title, and location

dialogs.updateGroupDetails: Update the details of this contact group

dialogs.descriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of who this group is for
dialogs.shareCodeHelp: 6-8 characters, uppercase letters and numbers only
dialogs.enhancedPrivacyComingSoon: Enhanced privacy features will be available in a future update.

dialogs.requireApprovalDescription: You must approve each viewer request

dialogs.freeTrialNote: All plans include a 14-day free trial. Cancel anytime.

fieldPermissionsEditor.configurePermissionsDescription: Configure permissions for company-related fields only. Employee personal information (avatar, social media, bio, contact details, profile, portfolio) is always controlled by the employee and cannot be restricted.
